about.title: Introduction
about.subtitle: About Let's Win VIP Club
about.introduction: Welcome to Let's Win VIP Club ‚Äì an exclusive destination for those seeking premium entertainment and luxury services. With elegant spaces, professional services, and world-class games, we are committed to delivering unforgettable moments for every guest.

experience.title: At Let's Win VIP Club, you will enjoy:

premiumPerks.pageTitle: PREMIUM PRIVILEGES AT HOIANA & HO TRAM
premiumPerks.freeHotelTitle: Free Hotel Room for VIP Members
premiumPerks.freeHotelDesc: As a VIP member, you will enjoy exclusive privileges, including complimentary hotel rooms. This is a great opportunity to experience luxurious accommodations without worrying about the cost. Take full advantage of high-end amenities, from cozy beds to premium in-room services.
premiumPerks.privateShuttleTitle: Private Shuttle Service for Top-tier VIPs
premiumPerks.privateShuttleDesc: As a top-tier VIP, you will receive complimentary private shuttle service, ensuring the most convenient and comfortable travel. No need to worry about transportation ‚Äì our private car will pick you up and take you anywhere within the resort for a flawless and luxurious experience.
premiumPerks.exclusiveGiftsDesc: In addition to premium benefits, VIP members will have the opportunity to receive exclusive gifts during special occasions throughout the year. These elegant and valuable gifts mark memorable moments in your journey with us ‚Äì not just items, but heartfelt tokens of appreciation.

freeTransport.title: Free Shuttle Service
freeTransport.description: Private VIP transportation service ‚Äì completely free for Let'swin guests.

items.pickup: Pick-up from airport, hotel, or city center
items.logo: Option to choose vehicle with or without Let'swin logo

eventPromotions.tournamentDesc: As a VIP member, you'll have the opportunity to participate in exclusive tournaments where you can showcase your skills, strategy, and talent in a world-class setting. These tournaments not only offer exciting challenges, but also chances to win attractive prizes and prove yourself among the elite VIP community.
eventPromotions.vipPartiesDesc: As a VIP, you‚Äôll be invited to regular complimentary parties and exclusive events held at luxurious venues. These gatherings offer the perfect chance to connect and socialize with fellow elites while enjoying a lively, high-end atmosphere with exceptional service.
eventPromotions.specialRewardsTitle: Big Prize Opportunities from Special Programs
eventPromotions.specialRewardsDesc: Exclusive programs designed for VIPs offer incredible opportunities to win big. Get ready to join exciting events, games, and activities where you could walk away with luxurious rewards ‚Äì from premium gifts to unforgettable travel experiences.

aboutSection.missionDescription: To become the trusted right-hand partner for every international guest coming to Vietnam in search of premium, safe, professional, and reliable entertainment.
aboutSection.missionStatement: Let‚Äôswin doesn‚Äôt just organize experiences ‚Äì we shape the VIP entertainment lifestyle for the elite.
aboutSection.letswinIntroMobile: Let‚Äôswin is a platform offering all-inclusive entertainment services for international tourists and high rollers.
aboutSection.letswinIntroDesktop: Let‚Äôswin is a platform that provides comprehensive entertainment services for international travelers and high-level players visiting Vietnam. We specialize in organizing and connecting clients with premium activities such as:

letswinServices.vipCasino: ‚Ä¢ VIP Casino experience with exclusive offers
letswinServices.transportSupport: ‚Ä¢ Transportation, game assistance, and translation services
letswinServices.customTours: ‚Ä¢ Customized tour schedules for relaxation and entertainment
letswinServices.nightSupport: ‚Ä¢ Emergency support even during the night

whoIsForList.internationalTourists: ‚Ä¢ International tourists looking to experience poker, casinos, and luxury relaxation in Vietnam.
whoIsForList.experiencedPlayers: ‚Ä¢ Experienced players seeking professional ‚Äì reliable ‚Äì discreet services.
whoIsForList.partners: ‚Ä¢ Partners looking to collaborate in developing high-roller client networks: tour operators, hotels, drivers, collaborators.

aboutSection.vipExperience: Beyond exclusive discounts, you can also enjoy private and luxurious VIP rooms. Fully equipped with high-end amenities and attentive service, these rooms offer the perfect place to unwind after your entertainment activities. With exceptional service and privacy, every moment of your stay will be truly memorable.

section1.title: Earn Points & Redeem Gifts
section1.description: Earning points and redeeming gifts through participating in games brings you exciting experiences and attractive rewards. By joining activities at the resort, not only do you get to enjoy entertainment, but you can also accumulate reward points to exchange for valuable gifts. The more you participate, the more benefits you receive‚Äîfrom exclusive gifts to priority services.

section2.title: Discounts on Dining, Hotel, and Spa Services
section2.description: Enjoy fine dining at premium restaurants, relax at the spa, or indulge in the luxurious hotel atmosphere‚Äîall made more accessible with our reward point discount program. Every reward point you earn brings practical value to your stay, ensuring your experience is both satisfying and rewarding.

section3.title: Private VIP Rooms with Premium Services
section3.description: Beyond regular discounts, you can indulge in exclusive and luxurious spaces through our premium VIP rooms. Fully equipped with modern amenities and personalized services, these rooms provide the perfect place to relax after enjoying games and entertainment. With attentive service and private space, every moment of your vacation will be truly memorable.

pokerClub.heading: Experience the Poker Club in Da Nang
pokerClub.privateRoomDescription: As a VIP member, you‚Äôll have access to exclusive poker tournaments where you can showcase your skills, strategies, and talent in a luxurious setting. These events not only bring exciting challenges but also offer opportunities to win prestigious prizes and assert your status among the VIP community.
pokerClub.clubDescription: Poker is more than just a game ‚Äì it‚Äôs a prestigious experience where smart decisions and refined strategies lead to worthy rewards. Playing poker means entering a world of luxury and prestige, where rewards go beyond money ‚Äì they symbolize success and honor. Every hand is a thrilling challenge where only the best players can conquer the stakes and establish their dominance in the poker elite.

stage1.title: ENTER ABOVE BEYOND

fineDining.title: Fine Dining Restaurants
fineDining.description: Discover the culinary arts at these fine dining restaurants in Singapore, Let's Win Club. Unravel layers of exquisite flavors from the finest ingredients, brought to life by exceptional expertise.

romanticRestaurants.title: Romantic Restaurants
romanticRestaurants.description: Transform any evening into a memorable occasion with the intimate ambience at these romantic restaurants. Perfect for celebrating anniversaries, engagements or simply savouring a special date night.

specialOccasions.title: Special Occasions
specialOccasions.description: Commemorate lifes most precious moments and add a dash of elegance to any occasion at these immaculate restaurants. Elevate your birthday bash to new heights with refined culinary creations.

shoppes.description: With an impressive selection of over 170 designer labels and luxury boutiques, your search for the finer things ends here. Spoil yourself with a captivating accessory to add some sparkle to your day, or find the perfect gift for that special someone.

responsibleGambling.title: RESPONSIBLE GAMBLING
responsibleGambling.subtitle: A Commitment to Our Patrons
responsibleGambling.description: Our commitment to creating unforgettable experiences extends to every facet of our resort ‚Äì right down to the casino floor.

paiza.title: THE PAIZA COLLECTION
paiza.intro: Reserved for the most discerning, the Paiza Collection embodies the ultimate home away from home, with unmatched luxury, thoughtful detail and boundless artistry at every turn.
paiza.description1: From discreet entrances to lavish ensuite facilities, every aspect of our finest suite collection is designed for privacy and comfort. Host elegant parties in our opulent dining rooms, customise your suite with varied entertainment options and bask in spectacular views of Singapore's cityscape and sparkling sea. Soothing eucalyptus timber, Italian Palisandro Blue marble, artisanal porcelain and silver accents and the finest handmade Savoir beds invite touch and ensure unrivalled comfort.
paiza.description2: Enjoy privileged access to Paiza Sky Residence, a private club lounge nestled atop our landmark hotel. Discover a world of rarified, insider experiences such as golf, wine tasting and yachting.
paiza.description3: Throughout your stay, our 24-hour butler team is on hand to anticipate your every wish, with a resolve to make anything possible.
paiza.description4: Welcome home to the Paiza Collection, a truly exceptional stay.

0.title: Paiza VIP Arrival
0.description: Touch down to a warm welcome with our dedicated greeters. Arrive in our new VIP arrival lounge via a private driveway and lobby accessible only to Paiza guests.

1.title: Exclusive Butler Service
1.description: Experience personalized 24-hour butler service, ensuring your every need is met with utmost attention and care.

2.title: Private Sky Lounge
2.description: Access the exclusive Paiza Sky Residence, offering panoramic views and premium services.

3.title: Curated Experiences
3.description: Enjoy bespoke experiences from private dining to yacht adventures, tailored to your preferences.

tour.title: Luxury Retreat ‚Äì Entertainment ‚Äì Golf Tour
tour.intro: Let'swin organizes all-inclusive tours that combine relaxation, entertainment, and golf ‚Äî tailored for customers who enjoy a premium lifestyle.

day2.item3: Evening: VIP Casino experience with personal host

aboveExpectation.title: ABOVE ALL EXPECTATION
aboveExpectation.description1: Perched on the highest floors of our iconic building, the Paiza Collection showcases breathtakingly grand yet serene interiors featuring lofty ceilings, luxuriantly plush furnishings and the finest materials, captivating artworks and superb views.
aboveExpectation.description2: An array of stunning objet co-created with top international artisans ‚Äî such as Fromental's stunning hand-painted silk wallcoverings, Zanetto's jewel-like brass vessels and Legle Asia's lotus-adorned porcelainware ‚Äî beguile the eye at every turn, surrounding you with beauty.
aboveExpectation.description3: From elegant soirees to deep rest, even the tiniest details have been carefully finessed for your comfort and pleasure.

premierRoom.title: Let's VipPremier Room
premierRoom.description: Unwind in your elegant room and savour the generous curation of treasures in the bespoke Armoire. Expect beautifully appointed in-room amenities and two-person bathtub, along with separate vanities.

paizaExperience.title: The Paiza Experience
paizaExperience.description: Revel in the pinnacle of sophisticated living at the new Paiza Collection. Discover the extraordinary world of Paiza and enjoy a taste of the privileges within.

packages.title: A Paradise That's Tailored to You
packages.description: Explore stay packages curated for families, couples and individuals with discerning taste, curious minds and an appetite for adventure

room.title: Let's VipPremier Room

skypark.paradise_title: A Paradise That's Tailored to You
skypark.discover_text: From 17 Jan, discover the past, present and future of Let's Win Club at Skyline Singapore: Stories From Above, a new showcase at SkyPark Observation Deck.
skypark.explore_text: Explore the city from a new vantage point at 56 storeys high, where the scenic view of Singapore's world-class cityscape is uniquely breathtaking. Feast your eyes on the lush Gardens by the Bay and the city's iconic landmarks, such as the durian-shaped domes of the Esplanade.
skypark.evening_view: In the evening, the observation deck also offers a spectacular view of Spectra.
skypark.sunset_experience: For a more intimate viewing experience, opt for Sunset in the Sky, an exclusive programme complete with priority access via a private entry point, dedicated seating areas and premium dining menu.
skypark.notice_text: SkyPark Observation Deck will close on the following dates at 9pm for Silent Disco Full Moon Parties (Last entry at 8pm)
skypark.location_text2: Entrance to the SkyPark Observation Deck is accessible via the Hotel Tower 3 driveway.

opening_hours.question: What are the opening hours for Let's VipSkyPark?
opening_hours.answer1: Let's Vip SkyPark ‚Äî including the Observation Deck ‚Äî is open from 10am to 10pm. Non Peak Hours: 10am ‚Äì 4.30pm (Last entry 4pm), Peak Hours: 5pm ‚Äì 10pm (Last entry 9.30pm).
opening_hours.answer2: The Observation Deck may be closed for private events or commercial commitments at certain times. Please call ahead at +65 6688 8826 to check if the Observation Deck will be open on the day you wish to visit.

weekday_escapade.title: Weekday Escapade
weekday_escapade.description: Experience the newly restored Let's VipPremier Room, stylishly fitted with a deep soaking bathtub and walk-in wardrobe. Begin each day with a sumptuous breakfast buffet, and take a dip in our world-famous SkyPark Infinity Pool.

infinityPool.title: SKYPARK INFINITY POOL
infinityPool.description: Gain a whole new perspective at the largest rooftop infinity pool in the world. Float among the clouds, bask in the sun or lounge under swaying palm trees at our iconic eyrie, 57 storeys above the glittering city.

lifestyle.title: Let's Vip LifeStyle
lifestyle.description: Unlock a world of exclusive rewards and perks with your complimentary Let's Vip LifeStyle membership, Singapore's most generous rewards programme.
lifestyle.tourist: Are you a tourist? Discover your exclusive privileges.

membership.description: For loyal players, featuring various privileges and rewards. Our VIP system includes four tiers: Green, Red, Gold, and Infinite, each with specific requirements and benefits.

lifestyle.title: Lifestyle
content: Automatically granted upon registration, no points required.

prestige.title: Prestige
content: Requires 5,000 ‚Äì 19,999 points or a minimum total wager of $50,000 within 6 months. Members must maintain at least 5,000 points per year to keep this tier.
10% discount at restaurants and bars, priority reservations at the casino.

elite.title: Elite
content: Requires 20,000 ‚Äì 49,999 points or a minimum total wager of $100,000 within 6 months. Members must maintain at least 20,000 points per year to keep this tier.
15% discount at restaurants and bars, VIP lounge access, complimentary shuttle service within a designated area.

paiza.title: PAIZA
content: Requires 50,000+ points or a minimum total wager of $250,000 within 6 months. This tier is invitation-only for VIP members. To maintain this status, members must wager at least $500,000 per year.

20% discount at restaurants and bars, access to the highest-tier VIP lounge, 24/7 personal VIP assistance, complimentary luxury transportation (including high-end vehicles or private jets), exclusive poker tournaments, and elite events.
